languages.text: "Потому что упоение страданием — высочайшая форма удовольствия, доступная лишь высшим созданиям. Таким, как ты, не дано познать этого наслаждения самим по себе".
"Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."
languages.original_text: "Потому что упоение страданием — высочайшая форма удовольствия, доступная лишь высшим созданиям. Таким, как ты, не дано познать этого наслаждения самим по себе".

traits.locale_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

languages.text: «Porque el éxtasis del sufrimiento es el mayor de los placeres, accesible solo para seres superiores. Las criaturas como tú sois incapaces por naturaleza de conocer este placer».
languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

traits.locale_text: «Porque el éxtasis del sufrimiento es el mayor de los placeres, accesible solo para seres superiores. Las criaturas como tú sois incapaces por naturaleza de conocer este placer».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “因为痛苦的狂喜是最高程度的愉悦，只有高等存在才能享受这样的愉悦。至于你们，你们受天性限制，无法体会这种快感。”
languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

traits.locale_text: “因为痛苦的狂喜是最高程度的愉悦，只有高等存在才能享受这样的愉悦。至于你们，你们受天性限制，无法体会这种快感。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「それは、苦しみの絶頂は最高の快楽であり、優れた存在だけが得ることができるものだからだ。お前のような生き物は、本質的にそのような満足感を知ることができない」
languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

traits.locale_text: 「それは、苦しみの絶頂は最高の快楽であり、優れた存在だけが得ることができるものだからだ。お前のような生き物は、本質的にそのような満足感を知ることができない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Parce que l'extase de la souffrance incarne le plaisir sous sa forme la plus noble, et qu'elle n'est accessible qu'aux êtres supérieurs. Les créatures de votre espèce sont par nature incapables de connaître une telle volupté. »
languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que l'extase de la souffrance incarne le plaisir sous sa forme la plus noble, et qu'elle n'est accessible qu'aux êtres supérieurs. Les créatures de votre espèce sont par nature incapables de connaître une telle volupté. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Weil die Ekstase des Leids die höchste Form des Vergnügens ist, die nur überlegenen Wesen zur Verfügung steht. Kreaturen wie Ihr sind ob ihrer bloßen Natur nicht in der Lage, solche Genugtuung zu empfinden."
languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

traits.locale_text: "Weil die Ekstase des Leids die höchste Form des Vergnügens ist, die nur überlegenen Wesen zur Verfügung steht. Kreaturen wie Ihr sind ob ihrer bloßen Natur nicht in der Lage, solche Genugtuung zu empfinden."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."

languages.text: "Çünkü ızdırabın verdiği mutluluk, tadabileceğimiz en büyük hazdır. Bundan da yalnızca üstün varlıklar anlar. Sizin gibi yaratıkların aklı, yaradılış gereği böyle güzelliklere ermez."
languages.original_text: "Because the ecstasy of suffering is the highest form of pleasure, accessible only to superior beings. By your very nature, creatures like you are incapable of knowing such gratification."
